text:
Hey, folks :wave-yeti:
Haven't been here for a whileâ€¦
Eager to catch up on things :raised_hands:

How are you all?
What's new in the HubSpot community these days?

Is anyone else running into an issue with having to provide developers with Super Admin permission to be able to create a private app?

With the new Partner Admin role, no one else on the team needs to be a super admin.

We've tried the preset developer permissions and it's not enough.

I would like to know if I'm missing something with how to configure the user permissions without super admin or suggestions for how you're handling this as a partner.
Hey Olia!!! We're all just plugging away at code and projects as usual :smile: Lots of great things happening over on HubSpot DevRel though - more to come!! How are you?
:graphql: the votes are in :graphql: - join us in <#C06TXAQ1LDV|graphql>!

Hey all, I just started playing with HubSpot, kicking tires so to speak.  I noticed that Sales module is not available as part of the free tier. Anyone know if i can get access to Sales and Marketing modules for learning purposes?
@all How can we convert website pages to Blog post?
